subject: Weight Lifting
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Behdad Salimikordasiabi, 22, won the gold medal in the men’s super-heavyweight division of weight lifting, cementing his status as the biggest sports hero in Iran.
snippet: Behdad Salimikordasiabi, 22, won the gold medal in the men’s super-heavyweight division of weight lifting, cementing his status as the biggest sports hero in Iran.
